title: Diamond V mid lane/jungle player looking for a full, dedicated and competitive team
body:
Hello, my name is EternalEmVy, I've been in many teams, however as of yet I've been in no such team that has regular practices+a competitive drive who stays together. I'll save you the trouble of looking me up.
Mid lane, my best champs include: Talon, Kat, Zed, Orianna, Vlad, Lux and Yas (situational)
Jungle, my best champs include: Rengar (situational), Yi, Volibear, Vi, Lee, Gragas and Kha'zix

While I still have a couple of meta champions to perfect such as Elise, Nid, Lulu, Leblanc I'm still more than willing to put in the time to dedicate myself to a team. All I need is a team that is non-casual yet still friendly. Anyhow, thank you for reading this, consider me if you may.

replies.body: Thinking about this, wouldn't it be better to introduce your real name over your summoner name? It shouldn't be against the "summers code" as long, as you're only using your name.
Well my real name should only be provided once I join a team and actually intend to stay (identity security).
